alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTHERN MARION AND SOUTHERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Williston to 6 miles northeast of Fort McCoy to near Pierson. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Citra, Lake Delancy, Sparr, Fruitland, Cross Creek, Orange Springs, Welaka, and Micanopy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
